title: FS T213-2 Mathewson (formerly PSA 2), Huggins (formerly SGC 30) ALL SOLDDD
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS T213-2 Mathewson (formerly PSA 2), Huggins (formerly SGC 30) ALL SOLDDD
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I have decided to put some of my T206 HOF group together again, so I am going to sell out of some of my extra stuff.  Cash is king and payment will be accepted over trades, unless the trade is already confirmed by both sides, but would consider trades involving OM Shag 3 or 4. or PSA 4 SOV 150 Evers PORT.

Here are my T213-2's
Mathewson (formerly PSA 2)- $400 SOLDDD
Huggins Port (formerly SGC 30)- $135 SOLDDD
Take the Mathewson and the Huggins for $.

Johnson (formerly PSA 2, mislabeled as T206)- $435  SOLDDD
Camnitz- $40  SOLDDD
Jennings- $55 SOLDDDD


Email is best, Paypal is fine.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Hi Bob,

Just wanted to mention the prices on both.  You have $525.

It's $500 if you buy them individually.  Did you make a typo?

Rob
